text: Kana kuti maive vapupuri here apo rufu rwakasvikira Ya’qoob (Jakobho)? Apo akati kuvana vake: “Chii chamuchanamata mushure mangu?” Vakati: “Tichanamata Mwari wenyu (Allah), Mwari wemadzibaba enyu Ibrahim (Abrahamu), Ismail (Ishumaeri), Ishaaq (Isaka), Mwari mumwechete, uyezve kwavari tinozvipira (muIslaam).”
